section.para: Indicates a combination of multiple historical or borrowed forms that have been combined to make this entry.
section.programlisting: multiEtymon: <id> etymon (2..n) type: (0..1) <string> language: (1..1) <string> note: (0..1) <string> reconstructed: (0..1) <boolean> label: (0..1) <string> href: (0..1) <url> listingOrder: (1..1) <number> etymTranslation: (0..n) etymDate: (0..1)

section.title: RDF

<multietymon>

  dmlex:type "..." ;

  dmlex:etymonLabel "..." ;
  dmlex:listingOrder 0 ;
